result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sonny N Chelmo

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Sonny N Chelmo
Current: 402 Timberlane Dr  Apt 3, Somerset, WI 54025 United States  (Effective: 10-17-2022)
Prior: 408 Coon Ave. S, Frederic, WI 54837

CASES: 22CF118, 22CM33, 22TR399, 22TR400, 22TR632. 10:29 AM Defendant Sonny N Chelmo in court.  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Sonny N Chelmo.  Attorney Holly D. Wood Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. Agreement recited. Amended information to be filed. On 22TR399 OWI 1st- def- G plea.  CT accepts, adj G. CT orders $987.50 forf. 60 dtp or set up PP with COCC. AODA and comply. 8 months revoked DL. 8 months IID.  22TR400 & 22TR632 dismissed on state's motion. 
 
On 22CF118 amended ct 1- def- G plea. Count 2- def- G plea. CT accepts pleas, adj G. Count 3 and 4 and 22CM33 RI&D on state's motion. Arguments. Counsel stipulates to 4 days credit. 

SENTENCE: 
Count 1: W/held 2 years probation. 
Count 2: W/held 2 years probation. Probation conditions on both counts: Mental health evaluation and comply. AODA and comply. AS. No drugs without a prescription. No drug para. No alcohol. No possession of firearms, bb guns, airsoft or pellet guns. Must report to probation today. Any treatment or programming required by agent. $265.60 fine/costs on both counts. $200 DNA surcharge on both counts, DNA sample. 60 dtp or set up PP with COCC. 4 days credit if revoked. PCR. 10:51 am adj.

CASES: 22CF118, 22CM33, 22TR399, 22TR400, 22TR632. 10:38 AM  Defendant Sonny N Chelmo in court.  Attorney Donna Burger in court for Sonny N Chelmo. Attorney Holly D. Wood Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk. Resolved.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on July 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

CASES: 22CF118, 22CM33, 22TR399, 22TR400, 22TR632. 10:24 AM Defendant Sonny N Chelmo in court. Attorney Donna Burger in court for Sonny N Chelmo. Attorney Holly D. Wood Webster in court for State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk.  Intake 22TR632: NG plea. Other cases not resolved, very close to resolution at this point. Bond cont. 10:27 am adj.
Status conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

CASES: PH in 22CF118. STC in 22CM33, 22TR399, 22TR400. 9:00 am. JL-Clerk. Def waives PH. CT accepts waiver. CT finds PC, Def bound over for trial. ARGN: Defense is preserved 15 days on prearraignment rights. Reading waived, plea NG. WST. Bond cont. 9:04 am adj.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Status conference on April 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

CASES: AIA in 22CM33 & STC in 22TR399 & 22TR400.  Defendant Sonny N Chelmo in court.  Benjamin James Webster appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 2:09 p.m. AO-Clerk. De qualifies, plea NG. 2:13 p.m. adj.  Status conference scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 4, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Not to possess or consume alcohol.  No controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed.  Not to possess or use drugs without a prescription or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.

Holly D. Wood Webster appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sonny N Chelmo appeared by video means from the PCJ.  Donna Burger appeared by video means.  BJM-clerk  1:43 pm  CT sets bond.  CT provides options to Def on obtaining counsel.  Pet for CT Appt'd Atty form to be provided.  Bond cont. 1:47 pm adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
